summary: Implements a mock representation of AWS EC2 launch templates, including their versions and associated metadata. Provides classes to create, update, delete, and retrieve launch templates and their versions, handle tag specifications, enforce naming rules, and expose CloudFormation attributes.
business_intent: Enable developers and test suites to simulate the full lifecycle of EC2 launch templates without contacting real AWS services, supporting infrastructure-as-code tools and automated testing of provisioning logic.
